name: Where Wind Becomes Quiet (itch)
description:
The game tells the story of a seriously ill writer suffering from amnesia. The disease robs of his last memories. Waking up to find himself in an unfamiliar place, the writer realizes that he can't remember anything. Trying to make sense of it all, he stumbles upon bright flashes that help him understand his connection to this place. Exploring the deserted mining settlement, the writer feels like he isn’t alone, and indeed a mystic power is tracking him and trying to fight back.

Exciting story 

The once-flourishing outpost has withered over time and long since been abandoned. Who are you and why are you here? What ties you to this place? Recover your memories bit by bit to get to the truth.

Unique atmosphere

Explore the abandoned mining settlement and discover the stories hiding under the cloak of time.

Uncommon puzzles 

The game puts you in unusual situations where you must solve puzzles based on natural cognitive human patterns.
